menuitem.label: New
menuitem.help: Create new workspace

menuitem.label: Open
menuitem.help: Load workspace from file

menuitem.label: Save
menuitem.help: Save workspace

menuitem.label: Save as
menuitem.help: Save workspace to file

menuitem.label: Close
menuitem.help: Close workspace file

menuitem.label: Load GRC file (Tcl/Tk GUI)
menuitem.help: Load map layers from GRC file to layer tree

menuitem.label: Add raster
menuitem.help: Add raster map layer to current display

menuitem.label: Add vector
menuitem.help: Add vector map layer to current display

menuitem.label: Add multiple rasters or vectors
menuitem.help: Add multiple raster or vector map layers to current display

menuitem.label: New map display window
menuitem.help: Open new map display window

menuitem.label: Close current map display window
menuitem.help: Close current map display window

menuitem.label: Close all open map display windows
menuitem.help: Close all open map display windows

menuitem.label: Common formats import
menuitem.help: Import raster data into a GRASS map layer using GDAL.

menuitem.label: ASCII x,y,z point import and gridding
menuitem.help: Create a raster map from an assemblage of many coordinates using univariate statistics.

menuitem.label: ASCII grid import
menuitem.help: Converts a GRASS ASCII raster file to binary raster map.

menuitem.label: ASCII polygons, lines, and point import
menuitem.help: Creates raster maps from ASCII polygon/line/point data files.

menuitem.label: Raw binary array import
menuitem.help: Import a binary raster file into a GRASS raster map layer.

menuitem.label: ESRI ASCII grid import
menuitem.help: Converts an ESRI ARC/INFO ascii raster file (GRID) into a GRASS raster map.

menuitem.label: GRIDATB.FOR import
menuitem.help: Imports GRIDATB.FOR map file (TOPMODEL) into GRASS raster map

menuitem.label: Matlab 2D array import
menuitem.help: Imports a binary MAT-File(v4) to a GRASS raster.

menuitem.label: PNG import
menuitem.help: Imports non-georeferenced PNG format image.

menuitem.label: SPOT NDVI import
menuitem.help: Imports SPOT VGT NDVI data into a raster map.

menuitem.label: SRTM HGT import
menuitem.help: Imports SRTM HGT files into raster map.

menuitem.label: Terra ASTER HDF import
menuitem.help: Georeference, rectify, and import Terra-ASTER imagery and relative DEMs using gdalwarp.

menuitem.label: LAS LiDAR points import
menuitem.help: Create a raster map from LAS LiDAR points using univariate statistics.

menuitem.label: WMS import
menuitem.help: Download and import data from WMS servers.

menuitem.label: Unpack raster map
menuitem.help: Unpacks a raster map packed with r.pack.

menuitem.label: Common import formats
menuitem.help: Converts vector layers into a GRASS vector map using OGR.

menuitem.label: ASCII points or GRASS ASCII format
menuitem.help: Creates a vector map from an ASCII points file or ASCII vector file.

menuitem.label: ASCII points as a vector lines
menuitem.help: Imports ASCII x,y[,z] coordinates as a series of lines.

menuitem.label: Historical GRASS vector import
menuitem.help: Imports older versions of GRASS vector maps.

menuitem.label: Historical GRASS vector import (all maps)
menuitem.help: Converts all older versions of GRASS vector maps in current mapset to current format.

menuitem.label: DXF import
menuitem.help: Converts files in DXF format to GRASS vector map format.

menuitem.label: WFS
menuitem.help: Imports GetFeature from a WFS server.

menuitem.label: ESRI e00 import
menuitem.help: Imports E00 file into a vector map.

menuitem.label: GPS data import
menuitem.help: Import waypoints, routes, and tracks from a GPS receiver or many common GPS file formats.

menuitem.label: Geonames import
menuitem.help: Imports geonames.org country files into a vector points map.

menuitem.label: GEOnet import
menuitem.help: Imports US-NGA GEOnet Names Server (GNS) country files into a GRASS vector points map.

menuitem.label: Matlab array or Mapgen format import
menuitem.help: Imports Mapgen or Matlab-ASCII vector maps into GRASS.

menuitem.label: LAS LiDAR points import
menuitem.help: Converts LAS LiDAR point clouds to a GRASS vector map with libLAS.

menuitem.label: ASCII 3D import
menuitem.help: Converts a 3D ASCII raster text file into a (binary) 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: Raw binary array 3D import
menuitem.help: Imports a binary raster file into a GRASS 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: Vis5D import
menuitem.help: Import 3-dimensional Vis5D files.

menuitem.label: Multiple import formats using OGR
menuitem.help: Imports attribute tables in various formats.

menuitem.label: Common export formats
menuitem.help: Exports GRASS raster maps into GDAL supported formats.

menuitem.label: ASCII grid export
menuitem.help: Converts a raster map layer into a GRASS ASCII text file.

menuitem.label: ASCII x,y,z points export
menuitem.help: Exports a raster map to a text file as x,y,z values based on cell centers.

menuitem.label: ESRI ASCII grid export
menuitem.help: Converts a raster map layer into an ESRI ARCGRID file.

menuitem.label: GRIDATB.FOR export
menuitem.help: Exports GRASS raster map to GRIDATB.FOR map file (TOPMODEL).

menuitem.label: Matlab 2D array export
menuitem.help: Exports a GRASS raster to a binary MAT-File.

menuitem.label: Raw binary array export
menuitem.help: Exports a GRASS raster to a binary array.

menuitem.label: MPEG-1 export
menuitem.help: Converts raster map series to MPEG movie.

menuitem.label: PNG export
menuitem.help: Export a GRASS raster map as a non-georeferenced PNG image.

menuitem.label: PPM export
menuitem.help: Converts a GRASS raster map to a PPM image file.

menuitem.label: PPM from RGB export
menuitem.help: Converts 3 GRASS raster layers (R,G,B) to a PPM image file.

menuitem.label: POV-Ray export
menuitem.help: Converts a raster map layer into a height-field file for POV-Ray.

menuitem.label: TIFF export
menuitem.help: Exports a GRASS raster map to a 8/24bit TIFF image file.

menuitem.label: VRML export
menuitem.help: Exports a raster map to the Virtual Reality Modeling Language (VRML).

menuitem.label: VTK export
menuitem.help: Converts raster maps into the VTK-ASCII format.

menuitem.label: Pack raster map
menuitem.help: Packs up a raster map and support files for copying.

menuitem.label: Common export formats
menuitem.help: Converts a vector map to any of the supported OGR vector formats.

menuitem.label: ASCII points or GRASS ASCII vector export
menuitem.help: Exports a vector map to a GRASS ASCII vector representation.

menuitem.label: DXF export
menuitem.help: Exports vector map to DXF file format.

menuitem.label: Multiple GPS export formats using GPSBabel
menuitem.help: Exports a vector map to a GPS receiver or file format supported by GPSBabel.

menuitem.label: PostGIS export
menuitem.help: Exports a vector map layer to PostGIS feature table.

menuitem.label: POV-Ray export
menuitem.help: Converts GRASS x,y,z points to POV-Ray x,z,y format.

menuitem.label: SVG export
menuitem.help: Exports a vector map to SVG file.

menuitem.label: VTK export
menuitem.help: Converts a vector map to VTK ASCII output.

menuitem.label: ASCII 3D export
menuitem.help: Converts a 3D raster map layer into a ASCII text file.

menuitem.label: Raw binary array 3D export
menuitem.help: Exports a GRASS 3D raster map to a binary array.

menuitem.label: Vis5D export
menuitem.help: Exports GRASS 3D raster map to 3-dimensional Vis5D file.

menuitem.label: VTK export
menuitem.help: Converts 3D raster maps into the VTK-ASCII format.

menuitem.label: Common export formats using OGR
menuitem.help: Exports attribute tables into various formats.

menuitem.label: Link external raster data
menuitem.help: Link GDAL supported raster data as a pseudo GRASS raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Link external vector data
menuitem.help: Creates a new pseudo-vector map as a link to an OGR-supported layer.

menuitem.label: Output format for raster data
menuitem.help: Defines raster output format utilizing GDAL library.

menuitem.label: Output format for vector data
menuitem.help: Defines vector output format utilizing OGR library.

menuitem.label: Copy
menuitem.help: Copies available data files in the current mapset search path to the user's current mapset.

menuitem.label: List
menuitem.help: Lists available GRASS data base files of the user-specified data type.

menuitem.label: List filtered
menuitem.help: Lists available GRASS data base files of the user-specified data type optionally using the search pattern.

menuitem.label: Rename
menuitem.help: Renames data base element files in the user's current mapset.

menuitem.label: Delete
menuitem.help: Removes data base element files from the user's current mapset.

menuitem.label: Delete filtered
menuitem.help: Removes data base element files from the user's current mapset using regular expressions.

menuitem.label: Raster to vector
menuitem.help: Converts a raster map into a vector map.

menuitem.label: Raster series to volume
menuitem.help: Converts 2D raster map slices to one 3D raster volume map.

menuitem.label: Raster 2.5D to volume
menuitem.help: Creates a 3D volume map based on 2D elevation and value raster maps.

menuitem.label: Vector to raster
menuitem.help: Converts (rasterize) a vector map into a raster map.

menuitem.label: Vector to volume
menuitem.help: Converts a vector map (only points) into a 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: 2D vector to 3D vector
menuitem.help: Performs transformation of 2D vector features to 3D.

menuitem.label: Sites to vector
menuitem.help: Converts a GRASS site_lists file into a vector map.

menuitem.label: Volume to raster series
menuitem.help: Converts 3D raster maps to 2D raster maps

menuitem.label: Georectify
menuitem.help: Manage Ground Control Points for Georectification

menuitem.label: Graphical modeler
menuitem.help: Launch Graphical modeler

menuitem.label: Run model
menuitem.help: Run model prepared by Graphical modeler

menuitem.label: 3D image rendering
menuitem.help: Creates a 3D rendering of GIS data.

menuitem.label: Animation tool
menuitem.help: Launch animation tool.

menuitem.label: Bearing/distance to coordinates
menuitem.help: A simple utility for converting bearing and distance measurements to coordinates and vice versa.

menuitem.label: Cartographic Composer
menuitem.help: Launch Cartographic Composer

menuitem.label: Map Swipe
menuitem.help: Launch Map Swipe

menuitem.label: Launch script
menuitem.help: Launches script file.

menuitem.label: Exit GUI
menuitem.help: Quit wxGUI session

menuitem.label: Display region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

menuitem.label: Set region
menuitem.help: Manages the boundary definitions for the geographic region.

menuitem.label: Mapset access
menuitem.help: Set/unset access to other mapsets in current location

menuitem.label: User access
menuitem.help: Controls access to the current mapset for other users on the system.

menuitem.label: Change working environment
menuitem.help: Changes/reports current mapset.

menuitem.label: Change location and mapset
menuitem.help: Change current location and mapset.

menuitem.label: Change mapset
menuitem.help: Change current mapset.

menuitem.label: Change working directory
menuitem.help: Change working directory

menuitem.label: Show settings
menuitem.help: Outputs and modifies the user's current GRASS variable settings.

menuitem.label: Change settings
menuitem.help: Outputs and modifies the user's current GRASS variable settings.

menuitem.label: Create new location
menuitem.help: Launches location wizard to create new GRASS location.

menuitem.label: Create new mapset
menuitem.help: Creates new mapset in the current location, changes current mapset.

menuitem.label: Version and copyright
menuitem.help: Displays version and copyright information.

menuitem.label: Display map projection
menuitem.help: Converts co-ordinate system descriptions (i.e. projection information) between various formats (including GRASS format).

menuitem.label: Manage projections
menuitem.help: Prints and manipulates GRASS projection information files (in various co-ordinate system descriptions).

menuitem.label: Convert coordinates
menuitem.help: Converts coordinates from one projection to another (cs2cs frontend).

menuitem.label: Install extension from addons
menuitem.help: Installs new extension from GRASS AddOns SVN repository.

menuitem.label: Update installed extensions
menuitem.help: Rebuilds all locally installed GRASS Addons extensions.

menuitem.label: Uninstall extension
menuitem.help: Removes installed GRASS AddOns extension.

menuitem.label: Preferences
menuitem.help: User GUI preferences (display font, commands, digitizer, etc.)

menuitem.label: Compress/decompress
menuitem.help: Compresses and decompresses raster maps.

menuitem.label: Region boundaries
menuitem.help: Sets the boundary definitions for a raster map.

menuitem.label: Manage NULL values
menuitem.help: Manages NULL-values of given raster map.

menuitem.label: Quantization
menuitem.help: Produces the quantization file for a floating-point map.

menuitem.label: Timestamp
menuitem.help: Modifies a timestamp for a raster map.

menuitem.label: Resample using aggregate statistics
menuitem.help: Resamples raster map layers to a coarser grid using aggregation.

menuitem.label: Resample using multiple methods
menuitem.help: Resamples raster map layers to a finer grid using interpolation.

menuitem.label: Resample using nearest neighbor
menuitem.help: GRASS raster map layer data resampling capability.

menuitem.label: Resample using spline tension
menuitem.help: Reinterpolates and optionally computes topographic analysis from input raster map to a new raster map (possibly with different resolution) using regularized spline with tension and smoothing.

menuitem.label: Resample using bspline
menuitem.help: Performs bicubic or bilinear spline interpolation with Tykhonov regularization.

menuitem.label: Resample using analytic kernel
menuitem.help: Resamples raster map layers using an analytic kernel.

menuitem.label: Support file maintenance
menuitem.help: Allows creation and/or modification of raster map layer support files.

menuitem.label: Update map statistics
menuitem.help: Update raster map statistics

menuitem.label: Reproject raster map
menuitem.help: Re-projects a raster map from given location to the current location.

menuitem.label: Tiling
menuitem.help: Produces tilings of the source projection for use in the destination region and projection.

menuitem.label: Color tables
menuitem.help: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a raster map.

menuitem.label: Color tables (stddev)
menuitem.help: Sets color rules based on stddev from a raster map's mean value.

menuitem.label: Create color rules
menuitem.help: Interactive management of raster color tables.

menuitem.label: Export color table
menuitem.help: Exports the color table associated with a raster map.

menuitem.label: Blend 2 color rasters
menuitem.help: Blends color components of two raster maps by a given ratio.

menuitem.label: Create RGB
menuitem.help: Combines red, green and blue raster maps into a single composite raster map.

menuitem.label: RGB to HIS
menuitem.help: Generates red, green and blue raster map layers combining hue, intensity and saturation (HIS) values from user-specified input raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Query values by coordinates
menuitem.help: Queries raster maps on their category values and category labels.

menuitem.label: Query colors by value
menuitem.help: Queries colors for a raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Raster to vector
menuitem.help: Converts a raster map into a vector map.

menuitem.label: Raster series to volume
menuitem.help: Converts 2D raster map slices to one 3D raster volume map.

menuitem.label: Raster 2.5D to volume
menuitem.help: Creates a 3D volume map based on 2D elevation and value raster maps.

menuitem.label: Buffer rasters
menuitem.help: Creates a raster map showing buffer zones surrounding cells that contain non-NULL category values.

menuitem.label: Concentric circles
menuitem.help: Creates a raster map containing concentric rings around a given point.

menuitem.label: Closest points
menuitem.help: Locates the closest points between objects in two raster maps.

menuitem.label: Mask
menuitem.help: Creates a MASK for limiting raster operation.

menuitem.label: Raster map calculator
menuitem.help: Raster map calculator.

menuitem.label: Moving window
menuitem.help: Makes each cell category value a function of the category values assigned to the cells around it, and stores new cell values in an output raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Neighborhood points
menuitem.help: Neighborhood analysis tool for vector point maps.

menuitem.label: Cross product
menuitem.help: Creates a cross product of the category values from multiple raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Raster series
menuitem.help: Makes each output cell value a function of the values assigned to the corresponding cells in the input raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Patch raster maps
menuitem.help: Creates a composite raster map layer by using known category values from one (or more) map layer(s) to fill in areas of "no data" in another map layer.

menuitem.label: Statistical overlay
menuitem.help: Calculates category or object oriented statistics (accumulator-based statistics).

menuitem.label: Quantiles overlay
menuitem.help: Compute category quantiles using two passes.

menuitem.label: Solar irradiance and irradiation
menuitem.help: Solar irradiance and irradiation model.

menuitem.label: Shadows map
menuitem.help: Calculates cast shadow areas from sun position and elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: Generate contour lines
menuitem.help: Produces a vector map of specified contours from a raster map.

menuitem.label: Cost surface
menuitem.help: Creates a raster map showing the cumulative cost of moving between different geographic locations on an input raster map whose cell category values represent cost.

menuitem.label: Cumulative movement costs
menuitem.help: Outputs a raster map showing the anisotropic cumulative cost.

menuitem.label: Least cost route or flow
menuitem.help: Traces a flow through an elevation model or cost surface on a raster map.

menuitem.label: Shaded relief
menuitem.help: Creates shaded relief map from an elevation map (DEM).

menuitem.label: Slope and aspect
menuitem.help: Generates raster maps of slope, aspect, curvatures and partial derivatives from a elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: Terrain parameters
menuitem.help: Extracts terrain parameters from a DEM.

menuitem.label: Textural features
menuitem.help: Generate images with textural features from a raster map.

menuitem.label: Visibility
menuitem.help: Computes the viewshed of a point on an elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: Visibility [DEPRECATED]
menuitem.help: Line-of-sight raster analysis program.

menuitem.label: Distance to features
menuitem.help: Generates a raster map of distance to features in input raster map.

menuitem.label: Horizon angle
menuitem.help: Horizon angle computation from a digital elevation model.

menuitem.label: Clump
menuitem.help: Recategorizes data in a raster map by grouping cells that form physically discrete areas into unique categories.

menuitem.label: Grow
menuitem.help: Generates a raster map layer with contiguous areas grown by one cell.

menuitem.label: Thin
menuitem.help: Thins non-zero cells that denote linear features in a raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Carve stream channels
menuitem.help: Generates stream channels.

menuitem.label: Fill lake
menuitem.help: Fills lake at given point to given level.

menuitem.label: Depressionless map and flowlines
menuitem.help: Filters and generates a depressionless elevation map and a flow direction map from a given elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: Flow accumulation
menuitem.help: Flow computation for massive grids (float version).

menuitem.label: Flow lines
menuitem.help: Constructs flowlines.

menuitem.label: Watershed analysis
menuitem.help: Calculates hydrological parameters and RUSLE factors.

menuitem.label: Watershed subbasins
menuitem.help: Generates watershed subbasins raster map.

menuitem.label: Watershed basin creation
menuitem.help: Creates watershed basins.

menuitem.label: SIMWE Overland flow modeling
menuitem.help: Overland flow hydrologic simulation using path sampling method (SIMWE).

menuitem.label: SIMWE Sediment flux modeling
menuitem.help: Sediment transport and erosion/deposition simulation using path sampling method (SIMWE).

menuitem.label: Topographic index map
menuitem.help: Creates topographic index map from elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: TOPMODEL simulation
menuitem.help: Simulates TOPMODEL which is a physically based hydrologic model.

menuitem.label: USLE K-factor
menuitem.help: Computes USLE Soil Erodibility Factor (K).

menuitem.label: USLE R-factor
menuitem.help: Computes USLE R factor, Rainfall erosivity index.

menuitem.label: Groundwater flow
menuitem.help: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined and unconfined groundwater flow in two dimensions.

menuitem.label: Groundwater solute transport
menuitem.help: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined and unconfined solute transport in two dimensions

menuitem.label: Analyze landscape
menuitem.help: Contains a set of measures for attributes, diversity, texture, juxtaposition, and edge.

menuitem.label: Analyze patches
menuitem.help: Calculates attribute, patch size, core (interior) size, shape, fractal dimension, and perimeter measures for sets of patches in a landscape.

menuitem.label: Set up sampling and analysis framework
menuitem.help: Configuration editor for r.li.'index'

menuitem.label: Edge density
menuitem.help: Calculates edge density index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

menuitem.label: Contrast weighted edge density
menuitem.help: Calculates contrast weighted edge density index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Patch area mean
menuitem.help: Calculates mean patch size index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

menuitem.label: Patch area range
menuitem.help: Calculates range of patch area size on a raster map

menuitem.label: Patch area Std Dev
menuitem.help: Calculates standard deviation of patch area a raster map

menuitem.label: Patch area Coeff Var
menuitem.help: Calculates coefficient of variation of patch area on a raster map

menuitem.label: Patch density
menuitem.help: Calculates patch density index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm

menuitem.label: Patch number
menuitem.help: Calculates patch number index on a raster map, using a 4 neighbour algorithm.

menuitem.label: Dominance's diversity
menuitem.help: Calculates dominance's diversity index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Shannon's diversity
menuitem.help: Calculates Shannon's diversity index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Simpson's diversity
menuitem.help: Calculates Simpson's diversity index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Richness
menuitem.help: Calculates dominance's diversity index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Shape index
menuitem.help: Calculates shape index on a raster map

menuitem.label: Rate of spread
menuitem.help: Generates rate of spread raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Least-cost spread paths
menuitem.help: Recursively traces the least cost path backwards to cells from which the cumulative cost was determined.

menuitem.label: Anisotropic spread simulation
menuitem.help: Simulates elliptically anisotropic spread on a graphics window and generates a raster map of the cumulative time of spread, given raster maps containing the rates of spread (ROS), the ROS directions and the spread origins.

menuitem.label: Interactively edit category values
menuitem.help: Edits cell values in a raster map.

menuitem.label: Reclassify by size
menuitem.help: Reclasses a raster map greater or less than user specified area size (in hectares).

menuitem.label: Reclassify
menuitem.help: Reclassify raster map based on category values.

menuitem.label: Recode
menuitem.help: Recodes categorical raster maps.

menuitem.label: Rescale
menuitem.help: Rescales the range of category values in a raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Rescale with histogram
menuitem.help: Rescales histogram equalized the range of category values in a raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Random cells
menuitem.help: Generates random cell values with spatial dependence.

menuitem.label: Random cells and vector points
menuitem.help: Creates a raster map layer and vector point map containing randomly located points.

menuitem.label: Fractal surface
menuitem.help: Creates a fractal surface of a given fractal dimension.

menuitem.label: Gaussian kernel density surface
menuitem.help: Generates a raster density map from vector points map.

menuitem.label: Gaussian deviates surface
menuitem.help: Generates a raster map using gaussian random number generator.

menuitem.label: Plane
menuitem.help: Creates raster plane map given dip (inclination), aspect (azimuth) and one point.

menuitem.label: Random deviates surface
menuitem.help: Produces a raster map of uniform random deviates whose range can be expressed by the user.

menuitem.label: Random surface with spatial dependence
menuitem.help: Generates random surface(s) with spatial dependence.

menuitem.label: Bilinear and bicubic from vector points
menuitem.help: Performs bicubic or bilinear spline interpolation with Tykhonov regularization.

menuitem.label: IDW from raster points
menuitem.help: Surface interpolation utility for raster map.

menuitem.label: IDW from raster points (alternate method for sparse points)
menuitem.help: Surface generation program.

menuitem.label: IDW from vector points
menuitem.help: Surface interpolation from vector point data by Inverse Distance Squared Weighting.

menuitem.label: Raster contours
menuitem.help: Generates surface raster map from rasterized contours.

menuitem.label: Regularized spline tension
menuitem.help: Spatial approximation and topographic analysis from given point or isoline data in vector format to floating point raster format using regularized spline with tension.

menuitem.label: Ordinary or block kriging
menuitem.help: Performs ordinary or block kriging.

menuitem.label: Fill NULL cells
menuitem.help: Fills no-data areas in raster maps using spline interpolation.

menuitem.label: Basic raster metadata
menuitem.help: Outputs basic information about a raster map.

menuitem.label: Manage category information
menuitem.help: Manages category values and labels associated with user-specified raster map layers.

menuitem.label: General statistics
menuitem.help: Generates area statistics for raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Quantiles for large data sets
menuitem.help: Compute quantiles using two passes.

menuitem.label: Range of category values
menuitem.help: Prints terse list of category values found in a raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Sum area by raster map and category
menuitem.help: Reports statistics for raster maps.

menuitem.label: Statistics for clumped cells
menuitem.help: Calculates the volume of data "clumps", and (optionally) produces a GRASS vector points map containing the calculated centroids of these clumps.

menuitem.label: Total corrected area
menuitem.help: Prints estimation of surface area for raster map.

menuitem.label: Univariate raster statistics
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells of a raster map.

menuitem.label: Sample transects
menuitem.help: Outputs the raster map layer values lying on user-defined line(s).

menuitem.label: Sample transects (bearing/distance)
menuitem.help: Outputs raster map layer values lying along user defined transect line(s).

menuitem.label: Covariance/correlation
menuitem.help: Outputs a covariance/correlation matrix for user-specified raster map layer(s).

menuitem.label: Linear regression
menuitem.help: Calculates linear regression from two raster maps: y = a + b*x.

menuitem.label: Mutual category occurrences
menuitem.help: Tabulates the mutual occurrence (coincidence) of categories for two raster map layers.

menuitem.label: Create new vector map
menuitem.help: Create new empty vector map

menuitem.label: Edit vector map (non-interactively)
menuitem.help: Edits a vector map, allows adding, deleting and modifying selected vector features.

menuitem.label: Convert object types
menuitem.help: Changes type of vector features.

menuitem.label: Parallel lines
menuitem.help: Creates parallel line to input vector lines.

menuitem.label: Dissolve boundaries
menuitem.help: Dissolves boundaries between adjacent areas sharing a common category number or attribute.

menuitem.label: Create 3D vector over raster
menuitem.help: Converts vector map to 3D by sampling of elevation raster map.

menuitem.label: Extrude 3D vector map
menuitem.help: Extrudes flat vector features to 3D with defined height.

menuitem.label: Create labels
menuitem.help: Creates paint labels for a vector map from attached attributes.

menuitem.label: Create optimally placed labels
menuitem.help: Create optimally placed labels for vector map(s)

menuitem.label: Reposition vector map
menuitem.help: Performs an affine transformation (shift, scale and rotate, or GPCs) on vector map.

menuitem.label: Rectify vector map
menuitem.help: Rectifies a vector by computing a coordinate transformation for each object in the vector based on the control points.

menuitem.label: Reproject vector map
menuitem.help: Re-projects a vector map from one location to the current location.

menuitem.label: Support file maintenance
menuitem.help: Updates vector map metadata.

menuitem.label: Create or rebuild topology
menuitem.help: Creates topology for vector map.

menuitem.label: Rebuild topology on all vector maps
menuitem.help: Rebuilds topology on all vector maps in the current mapset.

menuitem.label: Build polylines
menuitem.help: Builds polylines from lines or boundaries.

menuitem.label: Split lines
menuitem.help: Splits vector lines to shorter segments.

menuitem.label: Split polylines
menuitem.help: Creates points/segments from input vector lines and positions.

menuitem.label: Clean vector map
menuitem.help: Toolset for cleaning topology of vector map.

menuitem.label: Smooth or simplify
menuitem.help: Performs vector based generalization.

menuitem.label: Add centroids
menuitem.help: Adds missing centroids to closed boundaries.

menuitem.label: Color tables
menuitem.help: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a vector map.

menuitem.label: Color rules
menuitem.help: Interactive management of vector color tables.

menuitem.label: Export color table
menuitem.help: Exports the color table associated with a vector map.

menuitem.label: Query with coordinate(s)
menuitem.help: Queries a vector map at given locations.

menuitem.label: Query vector attribute data
menuitem.help: Prints vector map attributes.

menuitem.label: Select by attributes
menuitem.help: Selects vector features from an existing vector map and creates a new vector map containing only the selected features.

menuitem.label: Select by another map
menuitem.help: Selects features from vector map (A) by features from other vector map (B).

menuitem.label: Vector to raster
menuitem.help: Converts (rasterize) a vector map into a raster map.

menuitem.label: Vector to volume
menuitem.help: Converts a vector map (only points) into a 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: 2D vector to 3D vector
menuitem.help: Performs transformation of 2D vector features to 3D.

menuitem.label: Sites to vector
menuitem.help: Converts a GRASS site_lists file into a vector map.

menuitem.label: Buffer vectors
menuitem.help: Creates a buffer around vector features of given type.

menuitem.label: Detect edges
menuitem.help: Detects the object's edges from a LIDAR data set.

menuitem.label: Detect interiors
menuitem.help: Building contour determination and Region Growing algorithm for determining the building inside

menuitem.label: Correct and reclassify objects
menuitem.help: Correction of the v.lidar.growing output. It is the last of the three algorithms for LIDAR filtering.

menuitem.label: Create LRS
menuitem.help: Creates a linear reference system.

menuitem.label: Create stationing
menuitem.help: Creates stationing from input lines, and linear reference system.

menuitem.label: Create points/segments
menuitem.help: Creates points/segments from input lines, linear reference system and positions read from stdin or a file.

menuitem.label: Find line id and offset
menuitem.help: Finds line id and real km+offset for given points in vector map using linear reference system.

menuitem.label: Nearest features
menuitem.help: Finds the nearest element in vector map 'to' for elements in vector map 'from'.

menu.label: Network analysis
menu.items:
`
Vector network analysis tool Tool for interactive vector network analysis. gui,vector,network OnVNet
Network preparation Performs network maintenance. vector,network,maintenance OnMenuCmd v.net
Allocate subnets Allocate subnets for nearest centers (direction from center). vector,network,allocation OnMenuCmd v.net.alloc
Split net Splits net by cost isolines. vector,network,isolines OnMenuCmd v.net.iso
Shortest path Finds shortest path on vector network. vector,network,shortest path OnMenuCmd v.net.path
Shortest path for sets of features Computes shortest distance via the network between the given sets of features. vector,network,shortest path OnMenuCmd v.net.distance
Shortest path using timetables Finds shortest path using timetables. vector,network,shortest path OnMenuCmd v.net.timetable
Shortest path for all pairs Computes the shortest path between all pairs of nodes in the network. vector,network,shortest path OnMenuCmd v.net.allpairs
Visibility network Visibility graph construction. vector,network,path,visibility OnMenuCmd v.net.visibility
Bridges and articulation points Computes bridges and articulation points in the network. vector,network,articulation points OnMenuCmd v.net.bridge
Maximum flow Computes the maximum flow between two sets of nodes in the network. vector,network,flow OnMenuCmd v.net.flow
Vertex connectivity Computes vertex connectivity between two sets of nodes in the network. vector,network,connectivity OnMenuCmd v.net.connectivity
Components Computes strongly and weakly connected components in the network. vector,network,components OnMenuCmd v.net.components
Centrality Computes degree, centrality, betweeness, closeness and eigenvector centrality measures in the network. vector,network,centrality measures OnMenuCmd v.net.centrality
Steiner tree Create Steiner tree for the network and given terminals vector,network,steiner tree OnMenuCmd v.net.steiner
Minimum spanning tree Computes minimum spanning tree for the network. vector,network,spanning tree OnMenuCmd v.net.spanningtree
Traveling salesman analysis Creates a cycle connecting given nodes (Traveling salesman problem). vector,network,salesman OnMenuCmd v.net.salesman

menuitem.label: Overlay vector maps
menuitem.help: Overlays two vector maps.

menuitem.label: Patch vector maps
menuitem.help: Creates a new vector map by combining other vector maps.

menuitem.label: Change or report categories
menuitem.help: Attaches, deletes or reports vector categories to map geometry.

menuitem.label: Reclassify
menuitem.help: Changes vector category values for an existing vector map according to results of SQL queries or a value in attribute table column.

menuitem.label: Update area attributes from raster
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics from a raster map based on vector polygon map and uploads statistics to new attribute columns.

menuitem.label: Update area attributes from vector
menuitem.help: Count points in areas, calculate statistics from point attributes.

menuitem.label: Update point attributes from areas
menuitem.help: Uploads vector values at positions of vector points to the table.

menuitem.label: Update database values from vector
menuitem.help: Populates attribute values from vector features.

menuitem.label: Sample raster maps at point locations
menuitem.help: Uploads raster values at positions of vector points to the table.

menuitem.label: Sample raster neighborhood around points
menuitem.help: Samples a raster map at vector point locations.

menuitem.label: Generate area for current region
menuitem.help: Creates a vector polygon from the current region extent.

menuitem.label: Convex hull
menuitem.help: Produces a 2D/3D convex hull for a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Delaunay triangles
menuitem.help: Creates a Delaunay triangulation from an input vector map containing points or centroids.

menuitem.label: Voronoi diagram/Thiessen polygons
menuitem.help: Creates a Voronoi diagram in current region from an input vector map containing points or centroids.

menuitem.label: Generate grid
menuitem.help: Creates a vector map of a user-defined grid.

menuitem.label: Generate from database
menuitem.help: Creates new vector (points) map from database table containing coordinates.

menuitem.label: Generate points along lines
menuitem.help: Creates points along input lines in new vector map with 2 layers.

menuitem.label: Generate random points
menuitem.help: Generates randomly 2D/3D vector points map.

menuitem.label: Perturb points
menuitem.help: Random location perturbations of vector points.

menuitem.label: Remove outliers in point sets
menuitem.help: Removes outliers from vector point data.

menuitem.label: Test/training point sets
menuitem.help: Randomly partition points into test/train sets.

menuitem.label: Basic vector metadata
menuitem.help: Outputs basic information about a vector map.

menuitem.label: Classify attribute data
menuitem.help: Classifies attribute data, e.g. for thematic mapping

menuitem.label: Report topology by category
menuitem.help: Reports geometry statistics for vector maps.

menuitem.label: Univariate attribute statistics for points
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics for attribute.

menuitem.label: Univariate statistics for attribute columns
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics on selected table column for a GRASS vector map.

menuitem.label: Quadrat indices
menuitem.help: Indices for quadrat counts of sites lists.

menuitem.label: Test normality
menuitem.help: Tests for normality for vector points.

menuitem.label: Create/edit group
menuitem.help: Creates, edits, and lists groups of imagery files.

menuitem.label: Target group
menuitem.help: Targets an imagery group to a GRASS location and mapset.

menuitem.label: Mosaic images
menuitem.help: Mosaics several images and extends colormap.

menuitem.label: Color balance for RGB
menuitem.help: Performs auto-balancing of colors for LANDSAT images.

menuitem.label: HIS to RGB
menuitem.help: Transforms raster maps from HIS (Hue-Intensity-Saturation) color space to RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color space.

menuitem.label: RGB to HIS
menuitem.help: Transforms raster maps from RGB (Red-Green-Blue) color space to HIS (Hue-Intensity-Saturation) color space.

menuitem.label: Rectify image or raster
menuitem.help: Rectifies an image by computing a coordinate transformation for each pixel in the image based on the control points.

menuitem.label: Histogram
menuitem.help: Generate histogram of image

menuitem.label: Spectral response
menuitem.help: Displays spectral response at user specified locations in group or images.

menuitem.label: Pan sharpening
menuitem.help: Image fusion algorithms to sharpen multispectral with high-res panchromatic channels

menuitem.label: Clustering input for unsupervised classification
menuitem.help: Generates spectral signatures for land cover types in an image using a clustering algorithm.

menuitem.label: Input for supervised MLC
menuitem.help: Generates statistics for i.maxlik from raster map.

menuitem.label: Maximum likelihood classification (MLC)
menuitem.help: Classifies the cell spectral reflectances in imagery data.

menuitem.label: Interactive input for supervised classification
menuitem.help: Generates spectral signatures by allowing the user to outline training areas.

menuitem.label: Input for supervised SMAP
menuitem.help: Generates statistics for i.smap from raster map.

menuitem.label: Sequential maximum a posteriori classification (SMAP)
menuitem.help: Performs contextual image classification using sequential maximum a posteriori (SMAP) estimation.

menuitem.label: Edge detection
menuitem.help: Zero-crossing "edge detection" raster function for image processing.

menuitem.label: Matrix/convolving filter
menuitem.help: Performs raster map matrix filter.

menuitem.label: Canonical correlation
menuitem.help: Canonical components analysis (cca) program for image processing.

menuitem.label: Principal components
menuitem.help: Principal components analysis (PCA) for image processing.

menuitem.label: Fast Fourier
menuitem.help: Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) for image processing.

menuitem.label: Inverse Fast Fourier
menuitem.help: Inverse Fast Fourier Transform (IFFT) for image processing.

menuitem.label: Aster DN to radiance/reflectance
menuitem.help: Calculates Top of Atmosphere Radiance/Reflectance/Brightness Temperature from ASTER DN.

menuitem.label: Landsat DN to radiance/reflectance
menuitem.help: Calculates top-of-atmosphere radiance or reflectance and temperature for Landsat MSS/TM/ETM+.
menuitem.keywords: imagery,radiometric conversion,landsat,top-of-atmosphere reflectance,dos-type simple atmospheric correction

menuitem.label: Landsat cloud cover assessment
menuitem.help: Performs Landsat TM/ETM+ Automatic Cloud Cover Assessment (ACCA).

menuitem.label: Modis quality control
menuitem.help: Extracts quality control parameters from Modis QC layers.
menuitem.keywords: imagery,imagery quality assessment,surface reflectance,land surface temperature,vegetation,MODIS

menuitem.label: Atmospheric correction
menuitem.help: Performs atmospheric correction using the 6S algorithm.

menuitem.label: LatLong map
menuitem.help: Creates a latitude/longitude raster map.

menuitem.label: Sunshine hours
menuitem.help: Creates a sunshine hours map.

menuitem.label: Vegetation indices
menuitem.help: Calculates different types of vegetation indices.

menuitem.label: Tasseled cap vegetation index
menuitem.help: Performs Tasseled Cap (Kauth Thomas) transformation for LANDSAT-TM data.

menuitem.label: Albedo
menuitem.help: Computes broad band albedo from surface reflectance.

menuitem.label: Emissivity
menuitem.help: Computes emissivity from NDVI, generic method for sparse land.

menuitem.label: Biomass growth
menuitem.help: Computes biomass growth, precursor of crop yield calculation.

menuitem.label: Instantaneaous Net Radiation
menuitem.help: Net radiation approximation (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

menuitem.label: Soil heat flux
menuitem.help: Soil heat flux approximation (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

menuitem.label: Sensible heat flux
menuitem.help: Computes sensible heat flux iteration SEBAL 01.

menuitem.label: Evaporative fraction
menuitem.help: Computes evaporative fraction (Bastiaanssen, 1995) and root zone soil moisture (Makin, Molden and Bastiaanssen, 2001).

menuitem.label: Actual Evapotranspiration
menuitem.help: Actual evapotranspiration for diurnal period (Bastiaanssen, 1995).

menuitem.label: Temporal integration of ETa
menuitem.help: Computes temporal integration of satellite ET actual (ETa) following the daily ET reference (ETo) from meteorological station(s).

menuitem.label: Hargreaves methods Evapotranspiration
menuitem.help: Computes evapotranspiration calculation modified or original Hargreaves formulation, 2001.

menuitem.label: Penman-Monteith Evapotranspiration
menuitem.help: Computes potential evapotranspiration calculation with hourly Penman-Monteith.

menuitem.label: Priestley-Taylor Evapotranspiration
menuitem.help: Computes evapotranspiration calculation Prestley and Taylor formulation, 1972.

menuitem.label: Bit pattern comparison
menuitem.help: Compares bit patterns with a raster map.

menuitem.label: Kappa analysis
menuitem.help: Calculate error matrix and kappa parameter for accuracy assessment of classification result.

menuitem.label: OIF for LandSat TM
menuitem.help: Calculates Optimum-Index-Factor table for LANDSAT TM bands 1-5, & 7

menuitem.label: Manage 3D NULL values
menuitem.help: Explicitly create the 3D NULL-value bitmap file.

menuitem.label: Manage timestamp
menuitem.help: Print/add/remove a timestamp for a 3D raster map

menuitem.label: Volume to raster series
menuitem.help: Converts 3D raster maps to 2D raster maps

menuitem.label: 3D color tables
menuitem.help: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: Export 3D color table
menuitem.help: Exports the color table associated with a 3D raster map.

menuitem.label: 3D Mask
menuitem.help: Establishes the current working 3D raster mask.

menuitem.label: Volume calculator
menuitem.help: 3D raster map calculator.

menuitem.label: Cross section
menuitem.help: Creates cross section 2D raster map from 3D raster map based on 2D elevation map

menuitem.label: Groundwater modeling
menuitem.help: Numerical calculation program for transient, confined groundwater flow in three dimensions.

menuitem.label: Interpolate volume from points
menuitem.help: Interpolates point data to a 3D raster map using regularized spline with tension (RST) algorithm.

menuitem.label: Basic volume metadata
menuitem.help: Outputs basic information about a user-specified 3D raster map layer.

menuitem.label: Voxel statistics
menuitem.help: Generates volume statistics for 3D raster maps.

menuitem.label: Univariate statistics for volumes
menuitem.help: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null 3d cells of a raster3d map.

menuitem.label: List databases
menuitem.help: Lists all databases for a given driver and location.

menuitem.label: List drivers
menuitem.help: Lists all database drivers.

menuitem.label: List tables
menuitem.help: Lists all tables for a given database.

menuitem.label: Describe table
menuitem.help: Describes a table in detail.

menuitem.label: List columns
menuitem.help: List all columns for a given table.

menuitem.label: Connect
menuitem.help: Prints/sets general DB connection for current mapset.

menuitem.label: Login
menuitem.help: Sets user/password for DB driver/database.

menuitem.label: Create database
menuitem.help: Creates an empty database.

menuitem.label: Drop database
menuitem.help: Removes an existing database.

menuitem.label: Drop table
menuitem.help: Drops an attribute table.

menuitem.label: Copy table
menuitem.help: Copy a table.

menuitem.label: Drop column
menuitem.help: Drops a column from selected attribute table.

menuitem.label: Test
menuitem.help: Test database driver, database must exist and set by db.connect.

menuitem.label: Query any table
menuitem.help: Selects data from attribute table.

menuitem.label: Query vector attribute data
menuitem.help: Prints vector map attributes.

menuitem.label: SQL statement
menuitem.help: Executes any SQL statement.

menuitem.label: New table
menuitem.help: Creates and connects a new attribute table to a given layer of an existing vector map.

menuitem.label: Remove table
menuitem.help: Removes existing attribute table of a vector map.

menuitem.label: Join table
menuitem.help: Allows to join a table to a vector map table.

menuitem.label: Add columns
menuitem.help: Adds one or more columns to the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Drop column
menuitem.help: Drops a column from the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Rename column
menuitem.help: Renames a column in the attribute table connected to a given vector map.

menuitem.label: Change values
menuitem.help: Allows to update a column in the attribute table connected to a vector map.

menuitem.label: Drop row
menuitem.help: Removes a vector feature from a vector map through attribute selection.

menuitem.label: Reconnect vectors to database
menuitem.help: Reconnects attribute tables for all vector maps from the current mapset to a new database.

menuitem.label: Set vector map - database connection
menuitem.help: Prints/sets DB connection for a vector map to attribute table.

menuitem.label: GRASS help
menuitem.help: Display the HTML man pages of GRASS GIS

menuitem.label: GUI help
menuitem.help: Display the HTML man pages of GRASS GIS

menuitem.label: About system
menuitem.help: Prints system information

menuitem.label: About GRASS GIS
menuitem.help: About GRASS GIS
